bibl.title: Φόρος προβάτων: Tax or Rent?
bibl.note: Φόρος προβάτων was a rent on sheep which belonged to domain administration; in the course of the second century it became a compulsory lease at a fixed sum.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: EL-ABBADI Mostafa, Φόρος προβάτων: Tax or Rent?
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II (Cairo, 1992) pp. 205-215.
Φόρος προβάτων was a rent on sheep which belonged to domain administration; in the course of the second century it became a compulsory lease at a fixed sum.
